name: Cannibal Starfish
description:
In, Cannibal Starfish, Maka must reach the goal using five single-use grappling arms.

Maka is a peculiar starfish. Surrounded by a variety of prey, she remains stubborn about her diet of baby starfish. Maka is a cannibal. Remaining ignorant to the moral complications of her diet, Maka travels the sea, grabbing and swinging her way to find more tasty snacks. Will she ever realize the error of her ways? Will she ever be satisfied?

Made for Uofu 48 September 16 - 18 game jam. Theme: Be there in five.

------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

A and D - Roll

Space - Jump

Mouse  Left or Right Press - Grapple

Mouse Left or Right Release - Let Go

R - Restart the Level

------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Art: Logan, Nathan Van

Design: Joseph Hanks, Dakota Hoeschen

Engineering: Silas Barber, Archibald Faugno, Joshua Hardy, Gabriela Anderson, William Erignac
